text: Zulfikar Joy Ali (22 December 1978 â€“ 5 January 2015) was an Indo-Fijian boxer. Ali was once ranked 13th in the world and, in October 2005, was ranked 15th by the WBAProfile, boxnews.com.ua; accessed 5 January 2015. in the Super welterweight division. He beat Gary Comers for the PABA title. He was the brother of Junior Farzan Ali. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Boxers Category:Fijian sportspeople
title: Joy Ali
